name: EGDeployBCModule
friendlyName: Deploy BC module to a tenant
description: Deploys a per-tenant extension to a tenant in Business Central.
helpMarkDown: Please open a GitHub issue at https://github.com/crazycga/bcdevopsextension/issues for queries or support.
author: Evergrowth Consulting

inputs.name: TenantId
inputs.label: Azure Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure tenant id of the compiling tenant.

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: BC Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Business Central environment name of the compiling environment.

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: Azure Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure Entra client id for the process.

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: Azure Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure Entra client secret for the process.

inputs.name: CompanyId
inputs.label: Company Id (a guid)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The a company id for the (main) deployment; note that it will deploy to the WHOLE tenant.

inputs.name: AppFilePath
inputs.label: .app file name and path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file name and path to the already-compiled .app file.

inputs.name: SkipPolling
inputs.label: Skip waiting for deployment to complete; default: false
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to skip waiting for the deployment to complete; default: false.

inputs.name: PollingFrequency
inputs.label: Polling frequency (in SECONDS) of API (default: 10)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds between polling checks to see if the module is deployed.

inputs.name: MaxPollingTimeout
inputs.label: Max. time (in SECONDS) to wait (default: 600)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum time (in SECONDS) to wait for deployment to resolve.
